column4: Hi, i have recently done a new install of the latest ubuntu and it won't display the desktop. I can switch to consoles using cntrl+alt+# but the desktop (cntrl+alt_f7) gives me an "out of range" message.
anyone got any ideas of how i can fix?
ok, what is the best way to go about this? I'm fairly new to linux still
there's a good page right there ^^
